name: Cthulhu's Reach: Devil Reef
description:
In the bleak 1920s, luck abandons you, gripped by debt and entangled by the local gangster, Mr. Blackwood. Your path veers to the accursed seaside town of Innsmouth, where a hidden treasure is rumored to lie within Devil Reef.

Embark solo or with companions
Ferry to Devil Reef alone or with friends — let the journey begin.




Explore Devil Reef and its horrors
What is thought to be an effortless treasure hunt changes fast as you venture deeper, amassing gold. The once-promising labyrinth reveals its sinister nature. Corridors contort, and eldritch horrors multiply, presenting a daunting challenge. Are you strong enough to reach the mythic treasure at the bottom of Devil Reef?




Unlock powerful weapons and upgrades
Bolster your chances for survival with arcane scrolls and incantations. Unlock and enhance weapons to confront the impending otherworldly battle ahead.




Key features
  • Isometric action roguelike gameplay
  • Up to 4 player online co-op multiplayer
  • Unlock weapons and upgrades to progress further
  • Atmospheric soundtrack and effects
  • Wide range of Incantations boosts and give you new abilities
  • Generative dungeons - Three Acts with unique bosses will be added during early access
  • Map Editor for custom player created maps - Will be added during early access

Plunge Into the Abyss!
Prepare for a chilling journey into the heart of darkness with Devil Reef, an action-packed roguelike co-op dungeon crawler developed by The Fine Arc Nordic AB. Immerse yourself in a haunting universe inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's twisted tales, where pixel-art graphics and atmospheric soundscapes pay homage to the golden era of 90s gaming - Wishlist now!

Join the discussion on the Steam Forums or dive into the abyss on our Discord Server.
